name: RES_COMPONENTS
description: Primary table for result component information.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: Internal component ID

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component.

columns.name: COMPONENT_RESULT
columns.description: Component result interpreted value

columns.name: COMPONENT_VALUE
columns.description: Component result value

columns.name: COMPONENT_UNITS
columns.description: Component result units

columns.name: COMPONENT_ABN_C_NAME
columns.description: Component abnormal category value

columns.name: COMPONENT_DELTA_YN_NAME
columns.description: If this value is 1 (true), it indicates that a delta has occurred for this component.

columns.name: COMPONENT_NRML_LO
columns.description: This item specifies the lowest "normal" value for this component if applicable.

columns.name: COMPONENT_NRML_HI
columns.description: This item specifies the highest "normal" value for this component, if applicable.

columns.name: COMPONENT_CMT
columns.description: This item allows entry of a free-text comment related specifically to this component.

columns.name: COMPONENT_MTHD_ID
columns.description: The testing method for this component.

columns.name: COMPONENT_MTHD_ID_METHOD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the instrument interface, method, method grouper, or middle tier interface record.

columns.name: COMPONENT_RANGE
columns.description: The normal range for the component or a list of values that are considered normal.

columns.name: COMPONENT_INST
columns.description: The instant the component was resulted.

columns.name: COMPONENT_LAB_ID
columns.description: Resulting lab ID for this component.

columns.name: COMPONENT_REPORT_YN_NAME
columns.description: This item indicates whether or not a component should be reported.

columns.name: COMPON_DILUTION
columns.description: The factor by which the value is diluted

columns.name: COMPON_LINEAR_YN
columns.description: The linearity flag for this component

columns.name: COMPON_RPT_SET_BY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates how the report flag for this component was determined

columns.name: COMPON_REPORTABLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The reportable (notifiable) flag for this component

columns.name: COMP_VAL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The validation status category number for this component.

columns.name: COMP_VERIF_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The verification status category number for this component.

columns.name: COMP_VERIF_LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the lab that verified the component.

columns.name: COMP_VERIF_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who verified the component.

columns.name: COMP_VERIF_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: USR_OVRD_ABNRML_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record responsible for overriding abnormality or reference range. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: USR_OVRD_ABNRML_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: USR_OVRD_REP_FLG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record responsible for overriding the reportable flag. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: USR_OVRD_REP_FLG_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: OVRIDE_ABNRML_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether users can override the reference range or abnormality from Result Entry.

columns.name: OVRIDE_REP_FLAG_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether users can override the reportable flag from Result Entry.

columns.name: CMP_VERIF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant in UTC at which the component on the corresponding line was verified.

columns.name: COMP_LNC_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the LOINC record for this row as populated by the interface when results are received from an external resulting agency.

columns.name: COMP_ACCREDITED_YN
columns.description: This item determines the accreditation status of the corresponding component. If set to Y-Yes, the corresponding component is accredited. If set to N-No, the corresponding component is not accredited. If null, no evaluation was performed on the component to determine if it is accredited or not.

columns.name: COMP_UNCERTAIN_MEAS
columns.description: The extent to which a given value is uncertain (e.g. if the uncertainty percentage is 5%, then the component uncertainty value for a result of 1.00 will be +/- 0.05). NOTE:  This is how the data is stored in the database; as string format. This field stores numeric in M internal format, using a period as the decimal separator irrespective of locale.

columns.name: COMP_NETWORK_CONCEPT_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the network concept identifier associated with this component at the time of resulting.
